Container.Name: binhex-sabnzbdvpn
Container.Overview: SABnzbd is an Open Source Binary Newsreader written in Python. It's totally free, incredibly easy to use, and works practically everywhere. SABnzbd makes Usenet as simple and streamlined as possible by automating everything we can. All you have to do is add an .nzb. This Docker includes OpenVPN and WireGuard to ensure a secure and private connection to the Internet, including use of iptables to prevent IP leakage when the tunnel is down. It also includes Privoxy to allow unfiltered access to index sites, to use Privoxy please point your application at "http://host ip:8118".
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Port: Web Interface
Config.Description: This is the port for the Web UI for the application.

Config.Name: Port: Privoxy
Config.Description: This is the port for Privoxy application - HTTPS proxy server.

Config.Name: Port: microsocks
Config.Description: This is the port for microsocks application - Socks5 proxy server.

Config.Name: Port: Incoming port TCP
Config.Description: This is the TCP incoming port when VPN_ENABLED is set to 'no'.

Config.Name: Port: Incoming port UDP
Config.Description: This is the UDP incoming port when VPN_ENABLED is set to 'no'.

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: This is the container path to your configuration files, e.g. databases, configuration files, logs etc.

Config.Name: Path: /data
Config.Description: This is the container path to your downloaded files or user created content.

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_ENABLED
Config.Description: Specify whether to enable the VPN.

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_USER
Config.Description: Specify your VPN providers username.

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_PASS
Config.Description: Specify your VPN providers password.

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_PROV
Config.Description: Specify your VPN providers password.

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_CLIENT
Config.Description: Specify either Wireguard or OpenVPN.

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_OPTIONS
Config.Description: Advanced OpenVPN options, do not specify unless you know what you are doing.

Config.Name: Variable: STRICT_PORT_FORWARD
Config.Description: Specify whether to only permit connection to port forward enable endpoints - only takes effect for VPN providers PIA and ProtonVPN.

Config.Name: Variable: ENABLE_PRIVOXY
Config.Description: Specify whether to run Privoxy - HTTPS proxy server.

Config.Name: Variable: ENABLE_STARTUP_SCRIPTS
Config.Description: Advanced option, used to enable the running of an arbitary script before the VPN tunnel is established.

Config.Name: Variable: USERSPACE_WIREGUARD
Config.Description: Specify whether to use slower userspace Wireguard implementation.

Config.Name: Variable: ENABLE_SOCKS
Config.Description: Specify whether to run microsocks - Socks5 proxy server.

Config.Name: Variable: SOCKS_USER
Config.Description: Specify the socks (microsocks) username.

Config.Name: Variable: SOCKS_PASS
Config.Description: Specify the socks (microsocks) password.

Config.Name: Variable: LAN_NETWORK
Config.Description: Specify your internal network in CIDR format.

Config.Name: Variable: NAME_SERVERS
Config.Description: Specify the Name Servers used to perform lookups inside the container.

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_INPUT_PORTS
Config.Description: Specify any inbound ports for the VPN network.

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_OUTPUT_PORTS
Config.Description: SSpecify any outbound ports for the VPN network.

Config.Name: Variable: DEBUG
Config.Description: Specify whether you want to enable debug logging, useful when diagnosing startup issues.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_COMMAND
Config.Description: The command to execute in the healthcheck script, if not specified this will be DNS and HTTPS checks against google.com.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_ACTION
Config.Description: The action to execute if the healthcheck command returns a non zero exit code, if not specified the action will be 'exit 1', if you want the container to exit on failure then set the action to 'kill 1'.

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the running container.

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the running container.

Config.Name: Variable: UMASK
Config.Description: UMASK for the running container.
